output.sentences: The couple flew into the city they had planned a vacation for.
They took skyline trip to the mountains for the first day.
For the next day, they saw a soccer game at the stadium.
After that, they took some much-needed relaxation time on the beach.
Finally, on the last day, they saw one of the famous landmarks of the country.
